name: WP Subtitle Support for Better Internal Link Search
author: Marcus Jaschen

sections.description:
Better Internal Link Search improves the default internal link searching feature in a number of ways. What’s missing is the support for searching subtitles which are added by the WP Subtitle plugin.

Features

  • Searches subtitles added by WP Subtitle in the internal link search popup.

Additional Resources

  • Write a review
  • Contribute on GitHub
  • Follow @mjaschen
  • Visit Marcus Jaschen
sections.installation: Installing WP Subtitle Support for Better Internal Link Search is just like installing most other plugins. Check out the codex if you have any questions.
sections.changelog:
0.1.2 – 2018-02-09

  • tested with WordPress 4.9.4

0.1.1 – 2018-01-29

  • add minimum required PHP version

0.1.0 – 2018-01-29

  • Initial release.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing WP Subtitle Support for Better Internal Link Search is just like installing most other plugins. Check out the codex if you have any questions.

short_description: Adds support for the "WP Subtitle" plugin to the "Better Internal Link Search" plugin.

screenshots.caption: Standard search results from Better Internal Link Search. The post which has the search query in its subtitle is not found.
Results with WP Subtitle Support for Better Internal Link Search activated. The post with the given subtitle is shown in the results list.
